name: Undead Walking Experiment HD
description:
Kill all the undead by your fingers and try to hold on as more you can.

Undead Walking is back! with another gameplay.
Now you can use your fingers to destroy the damned Undead! or you can upgrade your arsenal by buying different weapons in the items shop, but remember always:
the weak point of Undead is the Head!!!
Story:
My name is Brando...I'm one of the survivors
Undead are everywhere...they killed my family
my friends my dog...now I can just survive
to kill all of them!

Get it now it's free!! Great Game Great Fun.
